summary: Diff appears to (1) remove the Before/After section from the Home and Gallery pages, and (2) switch the app to a light (white) theme with gold-accent tokens, including disabling system/dark default behavior via ThemeProvider. Some additional unrequested styling/SEO/typography-related changes are indicated by file summaries.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated SEO meta tags, Open Graph properties, and Google Fonts preloading (Inter/Montserrat) in the HTML entry point.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove Before/After sections and switch to a premium white+gold light theme; it did not request SEO/meta or font-preload changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration changes for a gold-compatible glow shadow.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on theme tokens and removing sections, but does not explicitly request adding new glow shadow utilities in Tailwind config.
